---
title: "Flights"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}

ggplot(data = flights) + 
  aes(x = dep_delay) +
  geom_histogram(color = "white") + 
  ## To transform the scale:
  scale_x_continuous(trans = "sqrt") # OR scale_x_sqrt() 
  ## To zoom in:
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-50,250)) # OR
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-25,250))
  
  


```
